name: isomorphically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has the same or a similar structure or shape: The figure's eyes are isomorphically positioned. L maps isomorphically onto its image, which is a standard line.
More examplesFewer examplesThese space-specific neurons can thus form a map of auditory space in which the positions of receptive fields in space are isomorphically projected onto the anatomical sites of the neurons.In Theorem 5 we show that every positive tight program can be isomorphically represented by a cascade program product of reset programs.
